introJoin.title: Become a member!
introJoin.subtitle: Join
introJoin.content: Once you have joined our fitness centre, there is no looking back, As the owners, we pride ourselves in the fact that you have the care you desire from personnel at our centre. We are professional, kind and very helpful in all areas. This is a safe space to train in, has a very fresh and modern look, still with the “old school” equipment which is maintained on a regular basis. We will look after all your needs to assist you in your goals for healthy living.

introSchedule.title: Get in the best shape!
introSchedule.subtitle: Schedule
introSchedule.content: Use the form below to book a class online.

introPortal.title: Login to your Committed Bodies private space!
introPortal.subtitle: Members
introPortal.content: The Member Portal is an area where you can manage your details, track your progress and book your classes.

introDownload.title: Stay up to date!
introDownload.subtitle: Download the app
introDownload.content: For easy access to schedules, classes, events and more.
